data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Module MIME::DecodeText decodes multipart differently encoded text
    string and returns a single text string constructed as concatenation
    of all parts.

    As the next step of development of this module I assume to realize
    recoding of each part of the decoded text into given codepage for
    languages with several encodings of national symbols, in particular
    Russian (cp1251, cp866, koi8-r etc.)
